clearcontrol.microscope.gui.halcyon

Class HalcyonGUIGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.microscope.gui.halcyon.HalcyonGUIGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggingFeature

    public class HalcyonGUIGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggingFeature
    Halcyon GUI generator. Uses the Halcyon library (based on DockFX) to build a GUI.
    Author:
    royer

      Instanciates a Halcyon GUI generator from a given microscope, microscope parent GUI, and a collection of halcyon node types.

        pMicroscopeInterface - micrscope
        pMicroscopeGUI - microscope GUI (parent of this generator)
